# Data Cleaning Overview

Key steps performed:

- Removed tracking columns (URLs, timestamps, duplicates)  
- Harmonized NAICS/SOC codes (kept 2022 NAICS + 2021 SOC)  
- Labeled missing values consistently  
- Standardized salary fields  
- Removed duplicate job postings
